title: SUPPLY OF ELECTRICITY TO PATIENT AREAS
fullText:
In New Zealand, care shall be taken to ensure that the safety of a patient area is not compromised by an earth-potential rise created by a neutral current flowing in an earth conductor because of links in switchboards between neutral and earth conductors found in installations constructed prior to 1993.
NOTE: Particular care should also be taken when an earth sheath return system is being used in the installation.
